title: About
body:
EASEOUT was launched in February 2020 by Tim Robards in Montreal, Canada.
We're a web design & development blog showcasing design inspiration found all over the internet. As well as publishing articles and tutorials about the latest web trends, technologies & possibilities.
The website runs on [Netlify](https://netlify.com) and is built with Vue.js.
**FAQS:**
* **Q:** Can I advertise? **A:** Yes! Email hello@easeout.co * **Q:** Can I submit my website? **A:** You sure can! Email hello@easeout.co * **Q:** How can I keep up with everything? **A**: Join the newsletter & follow us on [twitter](https://twitter.com/easeoutco)! * **Q:** How can I show some love? **A:** You could always Buymeacoffee :)
Your suggestions & feedback are welcome! I always aim to bring new features & improve your user experience.
\- Tim
